# occurrences

**Instance Property**

At most many times the event may occur This value is set when the struct was initialized with `.afterOccurrences()`

## Declaration

```swift
var occurrences: Int? { get }
```

## Instance Properties

- **date**: The latest date when the event may occur This value is set when the struct was initialized with `.afterDate()`
